attributes.action: Install an Independent Polygraph Testing Facility in the UK Parliament.
attributes.background: In the wake of the UK Parliament's allegations against Russia of a chemical weapons attack perpetrated on UK soil, and given that the Blair government was caught lying on the same issue of WMD, voters should have the right to have their politicians polygraphed on issues they vote on via social media

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
